titleStmt.title: A dialogue betwixt Sir George Booth, and Sir John Presbyter, at their first meeting near Chester, upon the rendezvousing of the Army: wherein, most of the machinations depending upon that affair, are discovered.
titleStmt.author: Delamer, George Booth, Baron, 1622-1684.
Presbyter, John, Sir.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
